name: Sass-Syntax-Highlight
description: Sass & SCSS Syntax Highlighting for Atom
readme:
# Syntax highlighting for Sass in Atom

This is a fork of [Atom-Syntax-highlighting-for-Sass](https://github.com/P233/Atom-Syntax-highlighting-for-Sass) which works in the latest Atom API.

**Note**: In order to make the syntax grammars defined by this package your defaults for `.sass` and `.scss` files, you must first disable the built-in [Language Sass package](https://github.com/atom/language-sass).
+
+Please feel free to [file an issue](https://github.com/thibmaek/Sass-Syntax-Highlight/issues/new) if you have any problems with this package or have any suggestions.
